item.title: Beogram 4000: Adjusting the AC Motor Voltage and Measuring the Voltage Differences Between the Phases
item.description:
During the restoration of a Beogram 4000 turntable, the AC motor requires precise adjustment. The service manual recommends setting the main phase voltage to 6V (RMS) and the frequency to 42.3 Hz for 33 RPM using an oscilloscope. To observe both motor phases, connect the oscilloscope probes across the phase capacitor. Begin the adjustment by setting the 33 RPM trimmer on the control panel to its neutral position.
